data.text: @LeilaniDowding Think there will be a LOT more coming.
@LeilaniDowding Even worse, all those evil anti-vaxers that tried to kill granny and warned everyone else will have to pay their equal share too.
@LeilaniDowding I mean, I know a lady that was in a car accident in the US 20 years ago and got £1 million + pay out....
@Soxthewavingcat @LeilaniDowding Wonder how safe you would think it is if someone in YOUR family got hurt...someone got destroyed in mine I don't think what you just said is funny at all...
@LeilaniDowding 110million... you think thst's a lot of money for claims? 🤣🤣🤣🤣
@LeilaniDowding It’s free money. The same free money that funded the LFT’s…. 🤦🏻 meanwhile the government indemnify the billionaire big pharma!
@LeilaniDowding 920 so far, check out VAERS and the Yellow Card reporting system, many, many more to come forward.

@Soxthewavingcat @LeilaniDowding And how many of them are just talking bollocks?

Someone I worked with told me they wouldn't get the booster because their hair extensions fell out after the second dose....
@LeilaniDowding 920 out of how many million? So it’s 99.99999 safe then 🤷‍♂️
